{"id":905378049,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1677423846,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/905378049/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"8.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int editDistanceUtil(string& S1, string& S2, int i, int j, vector<vector<int>>& dp){       \n        if(i<0)\n            return j+1;\n        if(j<0)\n            return i+1;\n            \n        if(dp[i][j]!=-1) return dp[i][j];\n            \n        if(S1[i]==S2[j])\n            return dp[i][j] =  0+editDistanceUtil(S1,S2,i-1,j-1,dp);\n            \n        // Minimum of three choices\n        else return dp[i][j] = 1+min(editDistanceUtil(S1,S2,i-1,j-1,dp),\n        min(editDistanceUtil(S1,S2,i-1,j,dp),editDistanceUtil(S1,S2,i,j-1,dp)));\n        \n    }\n\n    int minDistance(string S1, string S2) {\n        int n = S1.size();\n        int m = S2.size();\n        \n        vector<vector<int>> dp(n,vector<int>(m,-1));\n        return editDistanceUtil(S1,S2,n-1,m-1,dp);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false}
